errors.args: Provide a number of `<1-100> messages` to delete.

cleaned.title: Cleaned messages
cleaned.description: The user {{author}} `({{authorId}})` cleaned `{{messages}}` messages on channel {{channel}} `({{channelId}})`.

errors.noMember: You must `provide a valid user` before I can `ban` him from the server.
errors.clientPerms: This user has roles equal to or above mine, I cannot apply a punishment.
errors.memberPerms: This user has roles equal to or above yours, you cannot apply a punishment.
errors.sameMember: You cannot use this command on yourself, provide another user.
errors.sameClient: I can't use this command on myself... But I'm sorry to hear that you want to. 😕
errors.bannable: I couldn't ban this member, he probably has the same or higher permissions than mine.
errors.banned: This member is already banned on this server.

button.title: Ban
button.description: {{author}}, do you really want to ban {{member}} for the reason: `{{reason}}`?

banned.title: You have been banned! 😔
banned.description:
Hello `{{member}}`, unfortunately you have been banned from the `{{guild}}` server, for the following reason: `{{reason}}`. 
If you think there's been a mistake, contact the staffer who banned you: `{{author}}`.

errors.noMember: You must `provide a valid user` before I can `kick` him from the server.
errors.clientPerms: This user has roles equal to or above mine, I cannot apply a punishment.
errors.memberPerms: This user has roles equal to or above yours, you cannot apply a punishment.
errors.sameMember: You cannot use this command on yourself, provide another user.
errors.sameClient: I can't use this command on myself... But I'm sorry to hear that you want to. 😕

button.title: Kick
button.description: {{author}}, do you really want to kick {{member}} for the reason: `{{reason}}`?

kicked.title: You have been kicked! 😔
kicked.description:
Hello `{{member}}`, unfortunately you have been kicked from the `{{guild}}` server, for the following reason: `{{reason}}`. 
If you think there's been a mistake, contact the staffer who kicked you: `{{author}}`.
